news_header: reAlpha Tech Corp. appoints Piyush Phadke as CFO effective January 30, 2025.
news_text: reAlpha Tech Corp. has announced the appointment of Piyush Phadke as Chief Financial Officer, starting January 30, 2025. He takes over from Rakesh Prasad, the interim finance chief. Phadke brings over 20 years of finance experience, previously serving as Managing Director at BTIG, LLC.
